text: Almond cookies are acherished part of LunarNew Year as they areconsidered a symbol of goodfortune. We add a chocolateyKitKat crunch to our recipe,ensuring happiness allaround!This easy recipe bakes updelicious almond scentedcookies with a golden cracklyshell and soft, crumblyinterior, topped off with apiece of our irresistible KitKatMinis!
